attDef.desc: controls whether or not pattern names generated in the corresponding RELAXNG schema source are automatically prefixed to avoid potential nameclashes.

valItem.desc: Each name referenced in e.g. a rng:ref element within a content model is automatically prefixed by the value of the prefix attribute on the current schemaSpec
No prefixes are added: any prefix required by the value of the prefix attribute on the current schemaSpec must therefore be supplied explicitly, as appropriate.

exemplum.p: This content model allows either a sequence of paragraphs or a series of msItem elements optionally preceded by a summary:

remarks.p: As the example shows, content models in P5 may be expressed using the RELAX NG syntax directly. More exactly, they are defined using the pattern macro.schemaPattern. Alternatively, a content model may be expressed using the TEI valList element.

Comme l'exemple le montre, les modèles de contenu dans la P5 peuvent être exprimés en utilisant directement la syntaxe RELAX NG. Plus exactement, ils sont définis avec le modèle macro.schemaPattern. Une autre manière d'exprimer un modèle de contenu est d'utiliser l'élément TEI valList.
上例のように，P5の内容モデルはRELAX NGで表現されている．より厳密に 言えば，P5の内容モデルはmacro.schemaPatternで定義され ている．内容モデルは，要素valListを使い表現してもよい．
